p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Executes the query and cache its result for future offline use and listens to updates
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Runs the query and listens to further updates. The queried data is saved in the cache entry specified by its id for offline usage. (see `Offline: Clear Cache Entry` to clear the entry).

The output `query result` contains an ordered list of objects matching the query. The list is refreshed every time the resulting list gets changed in the database.

Unlike `Execute Query`, `Observe Query` produces multiple results, as the set of objects matching the query evolves.
The continuously updated list of objects matching the query
If provided, will keep the result of this query in the cache with the given name.
